Alerts

</details><MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          **1.To get [ alertId ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint (ReconSeer ):
          /alerts/get-list
          (**e.g.** "id": 671578,  "report_config_id": "DS378", "report_config_name": "Address Change" )
          
          **2.To get [ title ] and [   caseId  ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint (ComplianSeer ):
          /cases/active-case-list
          (**e.g.**"title": "TestCaseFtfCG",  "id": 708)
          
          **3.To get [  reason_id   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Rules & MDM ):
          /alerts/get-user-processor-programs
          (**e.g.**  "id": 15788, "name": "adjmoa")
          
          **4.To get [  assign_user_id   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ):
          /userDetails/users
          (**e.g.**   "first_name": "Read Write", "id": 2046 )
          
          **5.To get [  priority   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ):
          /codes/get-list-by-type
          (**e.g.**   "key": "2", "value": "Low" )
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"assign_user_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int32"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":99105}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"reason_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int32"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":6}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"priority"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int32"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":2}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"notes"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"test"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"filename"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"alertId"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string[]"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","default":"671605"}}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"title"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
